video.title: Chicken Town
video.synopsis: This animated series follows the adventures of Zino, a vain rooster who lives with a flock of hens in a deserted parking lot.

episodes.synopsis: It's sports day at the chicken coop. / There's a new arrival in the coop: a little gorilla. / Jack the businessman sells Polly a new invention.
episodes.title: Crocodiles Rock! / King Kong / The Machine

episodes.synopsis: Polly is jealous when her sister buys a turkey for dinner. / Zino invites the chickens to his new theme park. / Today is Lou's birthday.
episodes.title: Polly Wanna Turkey? / Zino's Ride of Terror / Happy Birthday Lazy Lou

episodes.synopsis: It's too hot to lay eggs! / Marjorie has a new toy: a set of headphones to talk to the chickens. / Zino displays his new talent as a singer.
episodes.title: Slooshie Please! / The Exchange / Mr. Music

episodes.synopsis: Zino's obsession with batteries is making him act aloof. / Karpi creates his own chicken. / Jenny accidentally discovers a flea's nest.
episodes.title: Batteries Not Included / Chickenstein / Fleas in the Coop

episodes.synopsis: Zino meets a member of the Poultry League for Defenseless Chickens. / Boris wins Polly over. / Zino builds a plane so he can fly.
episodes.title: Poultry League / Balalaika Balad / Roosterman

episodes.synopsis: Polly starts selling surprise eggs. / Jack has a new gadget for Polly: a robot chicken. / Jack gives Polly a poisoned apple.
episodes.title: Stuffed Eggs / Zwit Zwit / Polly Tales

episodes.synopsis: A thief has buried a stolen diamond in the chicken coop. / Zino tries to get his memory back. / Somebody kidnaps the chickens!
episodes.title: Diamonds Are the Hen's Best Friends / Sgt. Zino / The Kidnapper

episodes.synopsis: Someone abducts Jenny. / After accidentally swallowing her lipstick, Jenny lays a bright pink egg! / Polly enters Zino in a beauty contest.
episodes.title: When Karpi Meets Jenny / Think Pink / Polly's Pet

episodes.synopsis: A map of the coop falls into Jack's hands. / A prehistoric chicken is on display at the museum. / Zino escapes the cooking pot at the last minute.
episodes.title: The Treasure / Rare Bird / Father's Day

episodes.synopsis: Boris gives Polly special feed that makes chickens lay huge eggs. / Kellee signs up for a race. / Zino and the chickens begin floating into the air.
episodes.title: Black Tide / The Great Race / Flying Chickens

episodes.synopsis: A spaceship lands near Polly's shack. / Zino wakes up to find an egg by his side. Did he lay it? / Jackie Lee replaces Zino.
episodes.title: Space Invaders / Junior / Early to Rise

episodes.synopsis: Marjorie discovers a spell book at her Aunt Polly's house. / Chantal the cow and Zino fall for each other. / Jack disguises himself as a doctor.
episodes.title: Poultrygeist / Guess Who's Coming / Street Screams

episodes.synopsis: Zino invites the chickens on a dinner date. / Francine finds a magazine that claims chickens descended from sharks. / Karpi steals an egg.
episodes.title: Be My Valentine / Shark Attack! / Santa's Pause
